content: easy fresh and quick to make crochet stars christmas garland stars made in only 3 rounds a very simple pattern to follow and you can use your favorite colors to make lovely combinations it could be something personal do it yourself that will give a more endearing touch to your home this next holiday season for the christmas tree on your fireplace decorating a window skill level beginner equipment used cotton yarn crochet hook scissors daring needle pattern includes graphics written instructions in spanish / american english crochet terms
